ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: I better give %s a treat so they will keep doing that trick right.
I hope the crowd enjoys this show.
Oh no! %s messed up that trick!
%s did a great job on that trick.
Wow! %s did a really good job on that trick!
I bet the next show will be even better!
I better clean up for the next show.
Boy, that show left a bit of a mess.
Before too long, %s will totally know this trick.
